name: My High School Days Memories
description:
Your new life starts in high school! The last course seems to be boring, but you don't know the amazing adventures that the future holds for you.

Go from one class to the other and meet new friends on the way. Talk to them and get to know each other to prepare for the best summer of your life.

Then decide if you need holidays or even going to a summer festival. Do you prefer dating, meeting new friends or becoming the most popular person at the festival? Choose your own future and write your best memories in this top game in the US.

You will have fun with this life simulator, so don’t waste any minute and download it!

FEATURES OF THE GAME
- Unlockable Outfits
- Unlockable Game Modes
- Funny characters
- Daily Rewards
